name: FoodOrderTracking
0:
”Alexa, launch order tracking”
”Alexa, ask order tracking to track my food order”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: order tracking
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Alexa Food Order Tracking delivers updates from your Alexa devices when your food and restaurant orders are ready. 

Know when food has arrived without lifting a finger. 

Place an order with a growing number of participating companies on their mobile apps and websites. You’ll see an Alexa button at checkout. Then, log in to Amazon and select which of your Alexa devices will deliver updates out loud. Receive updates as announcements or notifications for pickup and delivery orders. 

This skill is used to deliver statuses to Alexa devices.
